summary: This is an email chain forwarding a show cause order from Judge Marra's chambers regarding the Epstein civil cases. The correspondence involves legal staff coordinating to share court filings and motions to stay.

persons.name: Judge Marra
persons.context: Issued a show cause order in the Epstein civil cases. His chambers sent the order to legal staff.

events.title: Judge Marra Show Cause Order Issued
events.description: Judge Marra's chambers sent a show cause order regarding the Epstein civil cases to legal staff.

keyFacts: A show cause order was issued by Judge Marra in the Epstein civil cases on May 14, 2009.
Legal staff were coordinating to share court filings, including motions to stay and responses.
The email chain indicates active legal proceedings in the Epstein civil cases at that time.
